import React , {useState,useEffect} from 'react' import Rightbar from '../../components/rightbar/Rightbar' import Sidebar from '../../components/sidebar/Sidebar' import Topbar from '../../components/topbar/Topbar' import Feed from '../../components/feed/Feed' import './profile.css' import axios from 'axios' import {useParams} from "" function Profile() { const PF= process.env.REACT_APP_PUBLIC_FOLDER const [user,setUser]=useState({}) useEffect(() => { const fetchUsers=async ()=>{ const res=await axios.get(`/users?username=Selena Gomez`) setUser(res.data) console.log(res.data) } fetchUsers() },[]) return ( <>

{user.username}

{user.desc}
) } export default Profile
